climbs.name: Stepstool
climbs.fa: Bert Severin, Dustin Dearborn, Ryanne Severin, Leslie Thomas 2007

content.description: Follow a line of bolts/pins up a series of bulges and mantles, protection is spaced similarly to Low Rent. This route also receives a lot of sun from early morning to early afternoon and dries quick after rain. It is possible to scramble to/from the anchor over exposed 4th class terrain left of the start, this can be pitched out with a couple spots for gear.
content.protection: 6 or 7 bolts and 1 pin, 2 bolt anchor at the top with chains and a rap ring.
content.location: 15 ft uphill and left of the overhang for the route Punks Ladder, walk around the arete and start at a birch tree below a clean low angle slab

content.description: A crag in between ENT gully and the Bat Cave Buttress containing a few routes.
